month.description: Ranpli formiler anba la baze lor bann valer ki afise lor ou peyslip.

chargeableIncome.subtitle: Reveni taksab (montan ki servi pou kalkil ou taks PAYE)

incomeDescription.travelingAllowance: Konpansasion transpor (montan ki ou anplwayer pey ou)
incomeDescription.maxNonTaxableTravelingAllowance: Konpansasion transpor maximal non taksab = 25% x Saler debaz (ziska {{maxAllowance}})
incomeDescription.taxableTravelingAllowance: Konpansasion transpor taksab (aplikab si konpansasion transpor depas konpansasion transpor maximal non taksab)

taxCharged.subtitle: Taks PAYE (sif arondi) faktire par MRA (afise lor peyslip)
taxCharged.calculationDescription: Kalkil taks PAYE: Lor sak ranze,
taxCharged.calculationSteps:
• Si reveni taksab restan pli tigit ki limit taksab, reveni taksab restan servi kouma montan taksab
  • sinon, limit taksab servi kouma montan taksab ek nou retir limit taksab depi dan reveni taksab restan pou prosin kalkil

year.description: Ranpli formiler anba la baze lor bann valer ki paye par ou, pa ou anplwayer, pou lane fiskal. Vizit sit web MRA (reveni non taksab ek soulazman, dediksion & alokasion) pou plis informasion.

baseSalary.label: Saler debaz (12 mwa)
baseSalary.description: Kalkil montan total saler debaz pou lane fiskal.

eoyBonus.label: Bonis EOY
eoyBonus.description: Nou osi apel sa bonis treziem mwa.

travelingAllowance.label: Konpansasion transpor
travelingAllowance.description: Kalkil montan total konpansasion transpor pou lane fiskal.

internetAllowance.label: Konpansasion internet
internetAllowance.description: Kalkil montan total konpansasion internet pou lane fiskal.

performanceBonus.label: Bonis performans
performanceBonus.description: Kalkil montan total bonis performans pou lane fiskal.

otherTaxableIncome.label: Lezot konpansasion taksab
otherTaxableIncome.description: Kalkil montan total bann lezot konpansasion taksab pou lane fiskal.

medicalInsurance.label: Lasirans medikal
medicalInsurance.description: Kalkil montan total lasirans medikal pou lane fiskal.

housingLoanInterest.label: Lintere lor lonn imobilie
housingLoanInterest.description: Kalkil montan total lintere lor lonn imobilie pou lane fiskal.

otherTaxDeductions.label: Lezot dediksion taks
otherTaxDeductions.description: Kalkil montan total bann lezot dediksion taks pou lane fiskal.

chargeableIncome.subtitle: Reveni taksab (montan ki servi pou kalkil ou innkom taks PAYE)

description.travelingAllowance: Konpansasion transpor (montan ki ou anplwayer pey ou)
description.maxNonTaxableTravelingAllowance: Konpansasion transpor maximal non taksab = 25% x Saler debaz (ziska {{maxAllowance}})
description.taxableTravelingAllowance: Konpansasion transpor taksab (aplikab si konpansasion transpor depas konpansasion transpor maximal non taksab)

taxCharged.subtitle: Innkom taks (PAYE) faktire par MRA (sif arondi)
taxCharged.calculationDescription: Kalkil taks PAYE: Lor sak ranze,
taxCharged.calculationSteps:
• Si reveni taksab restan pli tigit ki limit taksab, reveni taksab restan servi kouma montan taksab
  • sinon, limit taksab servi kouma montan taksab ek nou retir limit taksab depi dan reveni taksab restan pou prosin kalkil
